Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
Main controller class that manage the other controller and do the correct phase and correct player check

    • elaborateLoginMessage

      private Vector<Message> elaborateLoginMessage(LoginMessage msg) throws IOException
      This method elaborates login messages, differentiating between the ones send to set the details of each player and those used to set the parameters of the game
      Parameters:
      msg - The Login message received
      Returns:
      the vector of messages to be sent to the client

    • elaborateGameMessage

      private Vector<Message> elaborateGameMessage(Message msg)
      This method elaborates game messages, differentiating between the ones used to play a card specifically, a character or an assistant card, and those used to move elements inside the game board. It also checks whether an action can be performed.
      Parameters:
      msg - The game message to be elaborated

      Returns:
      the vector of messages to be sent to each client
